name: Komperdell Camera Staff - Unisex
description: Take your photo-studio to the great outdoors. This lightweight staff has a removeable grip, converting it from a walking pole to a sturdy monopod.3-section aluminum construction.Powerlock 3.0 for glove-friendly adjustment.Detachable cork grip with lower foam grip.Padded wrist strap.Threaded camera mount.Vario trekking basket.Tungsten and carbide flex tip.
